name: Chlorofluorocarbon (CFCs) emissions - UNEP
title: Chlorofluorocarbon (CFCs) emissions - UNEP
description: Emissions of CFCs are measured in ODS (ozone-depleting substance) tonnes, which is the amount of ODS consumed, multiplied by their respective ozone depleting potential value.

sources.name: Chlorofluorocarbon (CFCs) emissions - UNEP
sources.additionalInfo: Emissions of CFCs are measured in ODS (ozone-depleting substance) tonnes, which is the amount of ODS consumed, multiplied by their respective ozone depleting potential value.
